name: virtual-finder
description: Local-first macOS desktop app for AI-organized virtual file browsing
author: Virtual Finder Team

scripts.dev: npm run dev:ui & npm run dev:desktop
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/core && npm run build -w apps/ui && cd apps/desktop && npm run build
scripts.package: npm run build && cd apps/desktop && npm run package
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/dist apps/*/dist apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules
